RoboDrop Automation

We provide Automation consultations, programming and custom integrations for lab workflows.

About

With over 15 years of experience in molecular biology and six years specializing in lab automation, Iâ€™ve helped transform manual, labor-intensive workflows into efficient, scalable processes. My journey began as an undergraduate at the University of Washington, running large genetic screens by hand. Transitioning to industry, I spearheaded the development of a custom shotgun genomics library prep pipeline, turning what was once a week-long manual effort into a two-day automated process with an 8x increase in throughput.

From integrating Beckman Coulter Biomek liquid handlers with other lab instruments to creating custom scripts that seamlessly pass data between machines, Iâ€™ve built systems that let technicians focus on decision-making rather than repetitive tasks. My work spans DNA library prep, custom reagent workflows, and cutting-edge genomic engineering, including collaborations with industry pioneers like Dan Gibson at Synthetic Genomics.
